Reviews.Title: Semi Pro's Dream
Reviews.Author: Movie Maker in Fla.
Reviews.Content: This camera has all of the features of the much larger and heavier and more expensive cameras I have used. We also have a Canon 7D and really love it, but it is much larger and heavier than the T3i. So far I have seen no difference between the two cameras in the quality of the photos taken. The T3i seems to focus faster than the 7D, but it may be the lens. I will swap them and see if that makes a difference. In any event, both of these cameras are in my opinion well made and take supurb photos. Also one thing is for sure, I have made many purchaces through Amazon and have yet to have a problem, delivery was usually before promised. Even if I returned an item I was unhappy with it was taken care of.  RRM in Florida.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: FashionWithoutGuilt
Reviews.Content: A++++ I was in the market for the Canon Rebel t3i but I wanted to do some research online before spending so much money on such a large purchase. So after my Google search I found this listing online and thought it too good to be true.I had my boyfriend check it out and we made the purchase. I received my order before the estimated delivery time and everything was intact.For the accessories and the quality of the camera you cannot beat it. BEACHCAMERA IS THE BEST, I WILL BUY FROM THEM AGAIN FOR SURE.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor
ISO 100 - 6400 (expandable to 12800) for shooting from bright to dim light
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control
Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2)
Compatible with all Canon lenses in the EF lineup
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Digital Rebel T3i 18MP SLR Camera 18-55mm IS PRO Kit
